title: Roast Pork with Maple and Mustard Glaze

instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Place pork roast into a shallow roasting pan.
instructions.2: Stir maple syrup, mustard, vinegar, soy sauce, salt, and pepper together in a small bowl; spread evenly over pork roast.
instructions.3: Cook, uncovered, in the preheated oven until pork is slightly pink in the center, about 1 hour. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C). Remove from oven and let rest for about 10 minutes before slicing.

questions.question: Is pork roast from Step 1 still available in Step 2?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
Can we stir (Step 2) and cook (Step 3) at the same time?
